alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 2:51PM PST until January 09 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Gusts up to 55 mph possible for exposed, hilltop locations. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
